definition: individual/this/that/size/classifier for people or objects in general
head/hair style/the top/end/beginning or end/a stub/remnant/chief/boss/side/aspect/first/leading/classifier for pigs or livestock/CL:個|个[ge4]
(coll.) to feel as though one's head could explode (Tw)
pinyin: yi1 ge5 tou2 liang3 ge5 da4

sentences.english: Béka was a frog-faced boy a head taller than the others.
sentences.chinese: 贝卡是个长着青蛙脸的男孩，比其他人高出一个头。
意为这女孩的个头相当高。

sentences.english: This young chap is very tall.
This is a Millipede , but it's a giant !
sentences.chinese: 它是千足虫，但是个头很大。

sentences.english: This kind of watermelon is remarkable for its size.
The largest and most widespread heron in North America.
sentences.chinese: 这种苍鹭在北美分布最广，而且个头最大。

sentences.english: The twins are of equal height.
sentences.chinese: 这对双胞胎个头儿一样高。

sentences.english: She's slim , of medium height , with dark hair.
sentences.chinese: 她身材苗条，个头适中，头发颜色较深。

sentences.english: Hu Fengxue is my good friend, this year 11 years old, short not short.
sentences.chinese: 胡风雪是我的好朋友，今年11岁，个头不高不矮。

sentences.english: He just dropped that guy on his head.
sentences.chinese: 他真把那个家伙扔了个头戗地。

sentences.english: A standoff plate is mounted to an exterior side of the header plate.
sentences.chinese: 僵持板安装在一个头板外侧。

sentences.english: He mopped up 18 of the 20 first prize awards.
sentences.chinese: 他获得了20个头等奖中的18个。

sentences.english: I spoke to the referee after the game but laughing; in a good way.
sentences.chinese: 赛后我和主裁碰了个头，只是轻松地说笑。

sentences.english: He looked like a farmer—he was slim and wore a straw cowboy hat.
sentences.chinese: 他看起来像个农民，个头挺高，戴一顶牛仔草帽。

sentences.english: But, being small, they don’t eat much.
sentences.chinese: 但是由于个头小，它们吃的并不多。

sentences.english: Draw a body,a head and two feelers.
sentences.chinese: 画一个身体，一个头和两个触须。

definition: height (of person)/length of clothing from shoulders to bottom (tailor or dressmaker's measure)
